00009 #ifndef BOOST_TT_CONFIG_HPP_INCLUDED

00011 
00012 #ifndef BOOST_CONFIG_HPP
00013 #include "boost/config.hpp"
00014 #endif
00015 
00016 //
00017 // whenever we have a conversion function with elipses
00018 // it needs to be declared __cdecl to suppress compiler
00019 // warnings from MS and Borland compilers (this *must*
00020 // appear before we include is_same.hpp below):
00021 #if defined(BOOST_MSVC) || (defined(__BORLANDC__) && !defined(BOOST_DISABLE_WIN32))
00022 #   define BOOST_TT_DECL __cdecl
00023 #else
00024 #   define BOOST_TT_DECL 
00025 #endif
00026 
00027 # if (defined(__MWERKS__) && __MWERKS__ >= 0x3000) || (defined(BOOST_MSVC) && (BOOST_MSVC > 1301)) || defined(__EDG_VERSION__) || (defined(__GNUC__) && (__GNUC__ >= 3)) || defined(BOOST_NO_COMPILER_CONFIG)
00028 #   define BOOST_TT_HAS_CONFORMING_IS_CLASS_IMPLEMENTATION
00029 #endif
00030 
00031 #endif // BOOST_TT_CONFIG_HPP_INCLUDED
